item.description:
Attorney Kurt Haskell and his wife were aboard Flight 253 and witnessed the pre-board, boarding, and eventual attempted denotation of a bomb by the now infamous "UNDERWEAR BOMBER". This event which was publicized the world over, prompted the widespread use of full body scanners and intensified pre-flight body searches here in the US.

Attorney Haskell will be appearing and discussing what he experienced on the flight, his dealings with the FBI and Homeland Security, and what he has discovered since which is not being readily reported on mainstream news.

http://www.youtube.co...


FREE
please bring a friend!

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: Conversation with Kurt Haskell : "Underwear Bomber" WITNESS
